title: 3,000 YouTube Videos Exposed as Malware Traps in Massive Ghost Network Operation
description: A malicious network of YouTube accounts has been observed publishing and promoting videos that lead to malware downloads, essentially abusing the popularity and trust associated with the video hosting platform for propagating malicious payloads.
